documents.document:
LIFE IS A PERFORMANCE

The friendship and the film is so different. When you see it differently. But best of all is the friendship I have with the most wonderful people in the world. My friends in Hollywood.

Life sometimes gives you surprises are unforgettable moments. They always remain in memory and in the heart like a movie.
The movies sometimes end badly as well and sometimes in real life. But everything changes when the world of cinema is closer to one.

Gracias a ti. Thank you.

[b] One day I woke up with a very beautiful dream.
I said to God to give me a beautiful friendship, infinite, absolutely perfect. Never be lost in time. It is forever. And feelings are in the heart. And God answered me. Sure. And from that day. All change for me. I saw in the distance. That person was you.
So thank you for giving me your friendship. And I thank God for giving me a wonderful friendship as yours.
The friendship of friends is the best.
And friendship with my friends hollywood actors are wonderful.

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2012 :) ?

To all my friends I wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2012. Christmas is a feeling of love, peace, family and friendship.
From Lima-Peru ---I send you a hug and a kiss. ?

CHRISTMAS MAGIC OF GOD !!!

Christmas is a night of hope in our hearts. A family joy and love. With the gifts we say thank you and is a symbol and form and thank the person with all his heart.
Christmas is a night of celebration for the birth of a child of God and the arrival of pure love to our lives.
Christmas is a night life to thank for the great family and wonderful friends that God gives each year and Christmas. Christmas is to remind people that one is more special.
Christmas is a night to remember and feel the best moments. Recber Give and gifts. Giving and receiving family and friends. Giving and receiving God's love in our home.
Christmas is coming remember a time where hope one day this planet and think that God is always with us and never leaves us alone, that is always there to help us in difficult times.
The best gift that a person has is God in the hearts and minds. And we will never forget.
So Christmas is magical. And thank you baby Jesus for coming to our home.?

Golden Globe Awards 2012: More Nominations

MEJOR ACTRIZ COMEDIA
Tina Fey, 30 Rock
Amy Poehler, Parks and Recreation
Laura Dern, Enlightened
Zooey Deschanel, New Girl
Laura Linney, The Big C
.

MEJOR ACTOR SECUNDARIO SERIES/PELÍCULA PARA TV/MINISERIE
Peter Dinklage, Game of Thrones
Paul Giamatti, Too Big to Fail
Guy Pearce, Mildred Pierce
Tim Robbins, Cinema Verite
Eric Stonestreet, Modern Family.

MEJOR ACTRIZ SECUNDARIA SERIES/PELÍCULA PARA TV/MINISERIE
Jessica Lange, American Horror Story
Kelly Macdonald, Boardwalk Empire
Maggie Smith, Downton Abbey
Sofia Vergara, Modern Family
Evan Rachel Wood, Mildred Pierce
.

MEJOR PELÍCULA PARA TV/MINISERIE
The Hour
Downton Abbey
Cinema Verite
Mildred Pierce
Too Big to Fail.

MEJOR ACTOR PELÍCULA PARA TV/MINISERIE
Hugh Bonneville, Downton Abbey
Idris Elba, Luther
William Hurt, Too Big to Fail
Bill Nigh, Page Eight
Dominic West, The Hour.

MEJOR ACTRIZ PELÍCULA PARA TV/MINISERIE
Diane Lane, Cinema Verite
Romola Garai, The Hour
Emily Watson, Appropriate Adult
Kate Winslet, Mildred Pierce
Elizabeth McGovern, Downton Abbey.

Los Globos de Oro 2012 serán entregados el 15 de Enero en una ceremonia que será conducida por Ricky Gervais (The Office, Extras) y en la que Morgan Freeman recibirá el Premio Cecille B. DeMille.

10 Pre-Candidates for the Oscar for Best Visual Effects 2012

The Academy reported in its statement that all members of the visual effects section will meet on Jan. 19 to see excerpts of 10 minutes of each feature, to proceed after the vote that will give the five Oscar nominees .

'Captain America: The First Avenger'
'Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2'
'The Invention of Hugo'
&quot;Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol '
Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides'
'Real Steel'
'The origin of the Planet of the Apes
'Transformers 3: The Dark Side of the Moon'
'The tree of life'
'X-Men: First Generation'

Love and Friendship for me is:

Love is the most powerful force in the world. A feeling pure, perfect, special. A gift from God to us. Love for me is that. Something that occurs but asks nothing in return. Only love asks a person's love and true friendship.
Friendship to me is the best that life can give. It is support, trust company in good times and bad times.
True friendship is very strong. You always have the support a person. Never leaves you alone in the world. It's something that we always have and we must fight and keep on our side and never lose in time.

Remembering forever!!! ;)

?Remembering a Day ... I always felt what you were thinking ... because the force of love is great ... because the power of love is an illusion when it is actually getting better ... looking at the moon at night over the sea ... I see as they pass the stars and planets and your so far ... but the power of love is so important. Account only see you once more ... and just seconds ... one day there will come and say ... our friendship is strong.
?One day I noticed with surprise that chance and dreams if they are real if you insist ... but always dreaming ... and never leave without knowing what really happens ... Every day that passes like a dream ... every day I lost in your eyes. Dreaming that you stay forever ... in my dreams I see you and I wake up thinking ... is true or a dream? ... But when I look out the window at the landscape ... I realize that is real and you are real ...
?if your heart is for me ... I will not fail nor be mistaken ... an illusion that is real ... every day I have news for you ... nature tells me when you are alone and sad ... and when you're missing ... it will be for a little while ...
? I say a thousand things ... but something tells me that is not the time yet ... you're everything to me ... I want to tell you ... you ... you are unique ... you're happy ... tender ... you are perfect ... my little world that the day goes so fast ... dreaming you return to speak again ... I would tell you how are you? ... music ... you're so so happy ... all for me ... perfect size for me ... my favorite person ... like the horizon full of mysteries ... see you getting away ...
?You are as beautiful as nature ... you're like a dream in my life ... so special that sometimes I lose the horizon ... I love you even if they spend the years ... are so important that if one day you vaz ... could not think that would happen ... do not fence so again ... just ask you if you're going to fire you one day and tell me ... I will look for the promise always be in our way ... I have you like the music to the song ...
?As an angel seeing in the distance ... You are an angel ... always thinking of you ... you talk to God, that all goes well tomorrow will be another day ... soon ... soon will be an evening more ... I will now forces me today I missing ... I need to think ... if I'm doing the right thing ... tomorrow will be another night and I'll calm ... another way of seeing things ... but today I need to think again ... tomorrow morning thinking about you too ... an angel of God will tell me the truth ... in many ways ...

The Hobbit and The Lord of the rings.

What think you of these movies? And what character do you like?...Tell me

The movie: THE HOBBIT 2012-2013-2014

Now the movie is divided in part 1.2 and 3.Dime your comment ... What do you think of this beautiful story?. What is your favorite Actor for The Hobbit?, And that means for you The Hobbit? /
Ahora la pelicula esta dividida en parte 1,2 y 3.Dime tu comentario... ¿Que piensas de esta hermosa historia?. ¿Cual Actor es tu favorito de The Hobbit?, Y que significa para ti The Hobbit?

The time given to US!!!! ;)

The time given to us!

I always think ... every day is a great opportunity for all we can do with the time given to us ... every day we see the beauty of life ... we can see that every day can be wonderful family, friends or pets ... every day we have the opportunity to say thank you, something we use, God or to anyone who supports ... But that very few people do ... so now every day we have to be more observant ... analyze situations better ... looks good as long as you have and know you can do much more than before ...

WRITTEN BY: MARY GEORGIA GUANILO VELAOCHAGA
